text: Belus Prajoux Nadjar (born 27 February 1955) is a retired professional tennis player from Chile. Prajoux won six doubles titles on the ATP Tour during his career. He reached a highest doubles ranking of No. 17 in July 1982. He was a member of the Chile Davis Cup team, and played on the team that reached the final of the 1976 Davis Cup. Prajoux retired from the tour in 1986. ==Grand Slam finals== ===Doubles (1 loss)=== {|class="sortable wikitable" !style="width:40px"|Result !style="width:35px"|Year !style="width:160px"|Championship
